column1: Congratulations to my friend @tomemmer on being elected to serve another term as Chairman of the @NRCC! Thanks to Tom’s work House Republicans made important gains this election cycle. Looking forward to working hard with him to regain the majority in 2022! https://t.co/o82FQLztgo

To all who have served or are currently serving thank you for your service to our nation! Your sacrifice is what makes our nation secure strong and free and we can never thank you enough for that. #HappyVeteransDay! https://t.co/8D0QyKaDMp
Illinois voters made it clear in this election that we will no longer tolerate Supreme Court Justices who are pawns of Mike Madigan. https://t.co/idXIEst697
Congrats @hinsonashley! She’ll deliver results for the Midwest and make a great Representative for #IA01. https://t.co/6diWnL9bKO

Congrats to my friend @ElectRodney on a big victory last night! Rodney consistently delivers for his constituents and the voters again recognized his tireless work.   I am excited to represent central Illinois with Rodney for another term!

Illinoisans saw right through @JBPritzker’s tax hike sham. Voters resoundingly said they don’t trust Madigan-Pritzker with more power to raise taxes. A win for small businesses family farmers the middle class & fiscal sanity. Illinois has made it clear: don’t raise our taxes.

Thank you to everybody who put out a yard sign volunteered with our campaign or chipped in a small-dollar donation to help re-elect me! Your support made all the difference tonight and I can’t thank you enough for being in our corner every step of the way. https://t.co/if6K64mRpN

If you already voted for Darin and our Republican candidates-- thank you! Share that you voted for Darin with our “I Voted” sticker. And if you haven’t made it to the polls find your polling place here: https://t.co/NskAGdetO4 https://t.co/iBIMlFGl59

Polls are now open across #IL18! Now is our chance to make Congress conservative again. Get out and vote Darin LaHood for Congress! Find your polling place here: https://t.co/NskAGdetO4 https://t.co/j6A9wo2BVV
The @WhigNews has endorsed Darin saying he works for the benefit of his constituents and gives #IL18 a greater voice in Washington. https://t.co/qnC9YFmzGO

Tomorrow is Election Day and today is the last day to vote early in Illinois! Be sure to get to the polls because we need your vote to make Congress conservative again. Find your polling place here: https://t.co/NskAGdetO4 https://t.co/CHWgiinCMv

We have only 3 days left until Election Day! And only 2 days left to early vote in Illinois. Do you have a voting plan? Find your polling place here and make a plan to vote: https://t.co/NskAGdetO4 https://t.co/XpkhuMsWw6

Thanks to the Illinois Manufacturers’ Association for their support! Whether it’s ensuring good trade deals like the USMCA or fighting to hold China accountable I will continue to be a voice for Illinois manufacturers. #IL18 https://t.co/6FbGEY5pT3
Vote NO on Kilbride and reject Mike Madigan’s favorite judge! https://t.co/GQdh0m7bgR

“LaHood is best positioned to represent our interests in Washington. In his time as U.S. House member he has positioned himself as a member of the powerful House Ways and Means Committee the body that oversees revenue-raising measures and trade issues...”https://t.co/TX6jhtgGeZ
I’m honored to have the endorsement of the Illinois Farm Bureau. In Washington I’ll continue to represent the farmers of #IL18 and fight for their interests. https://t.co/kE4a1VzWzb
Springfield Democrats don’t deserve more power to raise taxes on Illinoisans. Vote NO on the Pritzker-Madigan tax hike amendment. @StopILTaxHike  https://t.co/fFQL5C0vzF

Election Day is just 7 days away! Now’s the time to make a plan to vote on November 3rd for Darin LaHood and make Congress conservative again. Find your polling place here: https://t.co/uL9pUiyijw https://t.co/apcq5eYDZt
Congratulations to JUSTICE Amy Coney Barrett! 🇺🇸 https://t.co/hg05zqAPV0

Voted with my youngest son Teddy! Encouraging everyone to get out and VOTE! NOV 3 is fast-approaching and early voting absentee voting by mail and voting on Election Day are all great ways to exercise your constitutional right.  Make sure your voice is heard. GO VOTE!! 🇺🇸#Vote https://t.co/5IXNUAmAhj
One step closer! #ConfirmACB  https://t.co/g5I2vcrzgs
Thank you for your support President @realDonaldTrump! https://t.co/v1HpNpJr4F

“The so-called fair tax is as unfair as it could be to the small business owners to their employees and to their customers.”  Politicians in Springfield shouldn’t get more power to raise your taxes. Vote NO on the Pritzker-Madigan tax hike amendment! https://t.co/BEXKx2ej5g

We’re down to the final 2 weeks of this election season. That’s just 2 weeks left to restore conservative leadership and flip the House. We need EVERY conservative to get out and vote! #IL18 https://t.co/O1n6tg7Jbo

“Representative Darin LaHood (R-IL) has built a strong conservative record promoting economic development and fiscal responsibility and he also recognizes clean energy as a great source of job growth and American competitiveness.” https://t.co/lzOgj8GHU6

Proud to hold an A rating from @SBAList for my work to stand up for life and the unborn in Congress! I will always defend the pro-life movement and give a voice to the voiceless. #ProLife https://t.co/5otNu0VqVO
Great to be with President @realDonaldTrump tonight! Proud to fight with you in Washington! #FourMoreYears https://t.co/yCzkcaLHyr

Judge Amy Coney Barrett showed why she is an exceptional jurist this week. Judge Barrett will apply the law fairly and protect the rights guaranteed by the Constitution not legislate from the bench. It’s time for the Senate to confirm her to the Supreme Court! #ConfirmACB https://t.co/ac8xDt48N6

The Pritzker-Madigan #TaxHikeAmendment would accelerate the exodus of Illinois residents and hurt small businesses. JB Pritzker Mike Madigan and Illinois Democrats don’t deserve more power especially more power to raise taxes. Vote NO! https://t.co/pTgbwqv31v

Less than 30 days left! We’re rapidly running out of time in this fight to take back the House from #NancyPelosi and every single dollar makes a major difference right now. Chip in to help make Congress conservative again this November! https://t.co/CrtnsKCIjW

“He supports free and fair trade agreements because he knows they are good for farmers and local exporters such as Caterpillar. LaHood worries about the national debt and called out Republicans as well as Democrats for overspending... LaHood is endorsed” https://t.co/R0tAqngClz

I had a great visit with President @realDonaldTrump tonight. Proud of our work together over the last four years to support central and west-central Illinois. We’re working hard to send him back to the White House for four more years! https://t.co/A3MNemPTmH
Today marks 50 days from Election Day! Are you planning to vote on or before Tuesday November 3? Take our election survey: https://t.co/OJxywtiCnu https://t.co/fJVAeyxPeY

A cowardly and disturbing act of violence against police officers. As a nation we are so much better than this.  I am praying for the officers ambushed and I will continue to #BackTheBlue. https://t.co/zLORNn4K6u

The Pritzker-Madigan tax hike amendment would raise taxes on farms & small biz in #IL18. Even in a tough economy Illinois Dems want to raise taxes. It’s wrong. Politicians like JB Pritzker & Mike Madigan shouldn’t get more power to raise taxes. Vote no. https://t.co/iwjZ56Svx7
“For America nothing is impossible.”—@realDonaldTrump #RNC2020 🇺🇸🇺🇸

“We are a nation of pilgrims pioneers adventurers explorers and trailblazers who refused to be tied down held back or reined in. Americans have steel in their spines grit in their souls and fire in their hearts. There is no one like us on earth.”—@realDonaldTrump #RNC2020
“As long as I am President I will defend the absolute right of every American citizen to live in security dignity and peace.”—@realDonaldTrump #RNC2020
“Tonight we proudly declare that all children born and unborn have a GOD-GIVEN RIGHT TO LIFE.”—@realDonaldTrump #RNC2020

“At the Democrat convention you barely heard a word about their agenda. But that's not because they don't have one. It's because their agenda is the most extreme set of proposals ever put forward by a major party nominee.”—@realDonaldTrump #RNC2020

“We obliterated 100 percent of the ISIS Caliphate and killed its founder and leader Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi. Then in a separate operation we eliminated the world's number one terrorist Qasem Soleimani.”—@realDonaldTrump #RNC2020
“By the end of my first term we will have approved more than 300 federal judges including two great new Supreme Court Justices.”—@realDonaldTrump #RNC2020
“In America we don't turn to government to restore our souls – we put our faith in Almighty God.”—@realDonaldTrump #RNC2020
“America is not a land cloaked in darkness America is the torch that enlightens the world.”—@realDonaldTrump #RNC2020
Great to be at the White House tonight! Looking forward to hearing President @realDonaldTrump accept the @GOP nomination! #TrumpPence2020 https://t.co/K6bM545F9M

Because of inaction and a lack of political will we entered this crisis forced to borrow massive sums on top of an already large and worrisome national debt. If Washington doesn’t change its ways America is on a dangerous path. https://t.co/3wwmkPVEQW

Today marks 100 days until November 3. Make sure you're registered to vote: https://t.co/1K4Fj1Dk6j and if you're already registered don't forget you can request your vote by mail ballot - https://t.co/zffrLykrlN https://t.co/xpASu5ne8I

Happy #IndependenceDay from Team LaHood! Join us in celebrating the 244th birthday of our great nation and the love of liberty and freedom! Happy 4th! https://t.co/yPOCiElYdM

Thank you @realDonaldTrump @kevinomccarthy and our law enforcement officials.  Left-wing mobs shouldn’t be allowed to vandalize and desecrate the legacy of Abraham Lincoln. He defeated the confederacy and ended slavery. We should be celebrating him not tearing him down. https://t.co/vVJuDwnMNB

Illinois’ Senators were offered the opportunity to propose amendments to the #JUSTICEAct yet they still chose to vote against even considering the legislation.  It's disappointing that Illinois Democrats are putting politics ahead of an important discussion on reform. https://t.co/sKgIPEH8QG

Great to be with my friend @DevinNunes & @koolidge to kick off the 2020 @ILGOP Convention & show our support for President @realDonaldTrump. Thanks to all the delegates who tuned in to show their support for President Trump Illinois Republicans & flipping Congress RED in 2020! https://t.co/M6b1ZE1MDh

76 years ago today Allied troops stormed the beaches of Normandy France. Many American lives were lost but our eventual victory signaled the beginning of the end for Nazi tyranny and oppression.  Join me in honoring their sacrifice. https://t.co/0KudeLIb8g
All gave some. Some gave all. Today we remember that the freedoms we enjoy as Americans wouldn’t exist without those who gave their lives to defend them. #MemorialDay2020 https://t.co/crGAskTuQr

It is deeply concerning that federal funding delivered to Illinois has seemingly not been distributed to local governments. While Chicago & other larger municipalities received federal aid our smaller rural localities continue to wait.   We need answers. https://t.co/XpVsSyEwP1

I agree with my friend @marcorubio.  #China’s proposed “national security” law against #HongKong must be condemned by all nations that defend freedom.  It will erode the autonomy Hong Kongers enjoy and criminalize protests under the guise of terrorism. #StandWithHongKong https://t.co/6mfd5zylrw

Gov. Pritzker’s threat to withhold Congressional appropriated funding from communities fighting to save their livelihoods is reprehensible.  Congress should act to ensure funding allocated for municipalities can’t be blocked. https://t.co/Dv0cVrg9kO

Whether you celebrate with your loved ones in person or from a distance this day reminds us that even in our most uncertain moments our moms are always there for us. Moms thank you for all that you do. Happy #MothersDay! https://t.co/3EGfrEHN6m

.@DevinNunes is exactly right. John Ratcliffe is an excellent choice by @realDonaldTrump to be DNI.  John has the temperament character and knowledge to lead our intelligence agencies. He’ll do a great job and the Senate should confirm him swiftly. https://t.co/qAjFxzNlPe
President @realDonaldTrump and one of #IL18’s greatest. God bless America. 🇺🇸 https://t.co/sgDvK4OHne
